channel.title: To many problems with my server
channel.description:
1. how do you make yourself a admin and make other people mods
2.how do you make it so you cant get attacked in wildy when your a mod/admin (i found a topic on this but when i search for i cannot find what i am lookin for
3. why is it if i log out and come off moparscape page and then load it up again, i cant get back onto to account i was on before (it freezes when i try to)
can anyone plz help me with the problems, im so close to making my private server, i can log on and off, iv made every place you walk the wildy, and it's source is cheezescape.

item.title: To many problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @fr33_t0_pk fr33_t0_pk
item.description:
@fr33_t0_pk wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:5, topic:6462”][quote author=fredric da third link=topic=8849.msg95730#msg95730 date=1154034160]

  1. how do you make yourself a admin and make other people mods

2.how do you make it so you cant get attacked in wildy when your a mod/admin (i found a topic on this but when i search for i cannot find what i am lookin for

  1. why is it if i log out and come off moparscape page and then load it up again, i cant get back onto to account i was on before (it freezes when i try to)

can anyone plz help me with the problems, im so close to making my private server, i can log on and off, iv made every place you walk the wildy, and it’s source is cheezescape.

[/quote]

Whisper whisper Oi, you there, yes you. Whisper whisper Don’t tell anyone I told you this, but there’s this new place for all your needs. All you need to do is click here.

[me=The Un-Named]fades off into the distances. [/me][/quote]

errrrmmmm… you know its Dont tell people unless you want to die

Read full topic
